name.ja: <ruby>波<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>状<rt>じょう</rt></ruby><ruby>防<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby><ruby>壁<rt>へき</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your Defense Position monster.

effect.en: Send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a monster(s) is among the cards sent, the attacking monster loses ATK equal to [the total Levels of the monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect] x 100 until the end of this turn.
